citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Office of Oceanic and Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL), Vents Program
citeinfo.title: U.S. Navy's DBDB5 (PMEL Vents)

descript.abstract: Using Navy's DBDB5 world bathymetric and topological data. The data are in Geographic Coordinates. Note that it cannot handle the longitude range that cross the Greenwich Meridian. For detail seafloor bathymetric, use the MultiBeam Database.
descript.purpose: To monitor the global ocean through underwater acoustics.

cntaddr.address: Hatfield Marine Science Center 2030 S. Marine Science Drive
Hatfield Marine Science Center 2030 S. Marine Science Drive
